curam.util.ctm.bom.impl

Class SecurityRoleReadAndUpsertBOMImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModuleImpl
      • curam.util.ctm.bom.impl.SecurityRoleReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule, ReadAndUpsertBOM

    public class SecurityRoleReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
extends BusinessObjectModuleImpl
implements ReadAndUpsertBOM
    This class is responsible for reading, updating and inserting Security Role BOM information. A Security Role BOM consists of the Security Role record and its associated Security Role Group records.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurityRoleReadAndUpsertBOMImpl()
      Default constructor that sets the Business Object type to Security Role and the offset to 0.

    • Method Summary

      This method constructs all Security Role related entities into xml and adds this xml to the boBody.
      org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
      This method takes in a Security Role name as the key for the Security Role BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the Security Role record and its associated Security Role Group records for this BOM.
      void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value, java.lang.String entityName)
      Sets the primary key value of the Security Role BOM which can consist of a Security Role header record and a number of Security Role Group records.
      void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier, org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)

      Update or insert an entity based on the entity name.

      void upsertSecurityRoleGroupEntity(java.lang.Object entityDtlsObj)

    • Method Detail

      • convertBusinessObjectContentToXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
                                                       throws AppException,
                                                              InformationalException
        This method takes in a Security Role name as the key for the Security Role BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the Security Role record and its associated Security Role Group records for this BOM. All of this information is then stored in XML format as specified by the BOM infrastructure.
        Specified by:
        convertBusinessObjectContentToXML in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains the Security Role name.
        Returns:
        xml representation of the Security Role BOM.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • constructSecurityRoleBOContent

        public java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> constructSecurityRoleBOContent(org.w3c.dom.Element boBody,
                                                                          BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                                                                          org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                                   throws AppException,
                                                                          InformationalException
        This method constructs all Security Role related entities into xml and adds this xml to the boBody.
        Parameters:
        boBody - This is the body of the xml that will contain all entity details for Security Role and Security Role Group records.
        boIdentifier - This contains the Security Role name key information.
        document - This is the document object used in processing.
        Returns:
        The list of dependency header information.
        Throws:
        AppException - General exception.
        InformationalException - General Informational exception.

      • upsert

        public void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                   org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
        Update or insert a Security Role BOM. This consists of Security Role record and its associated Security Role Group records.
        Specified by:
        upsert in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - This contains the Security Role name for the BOM.
        boDocument - This contains details of the Security Role BOM to be inserted or updated.
        Throws:
        AppException - General exception.
        InformationalException - General Informational exception.

      • setPrimaryKey

        public void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key,
                          java.lang.Object value,
                          java.lang.String entityName)
        Sets the primary key value of the Security Role BOM which can consist of a Security Role header record and a number of Security Role Group records.
        Parameters:
        key - Contains name of the column of an entity.
        value - Contains value of column of an entity.
        entityName - Contains name of the entity of assessment business object.

      • upsertEntity

        public void upsertEntity(java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.Object entityDtlsObj)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Update or insert an entity based on the entity name. This method will update or insert a Security Role or a Security Role Group entity.
        Parameters:
        entityName - Contains name of the entity which should be either Security Role or a Security Role Group.
        entityDtlsObj - Contains details of the entity.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
